type: Legendary Creature – Dragon Shapeshifter Lord Noble
rules_text:
[i]Honorable Leader[/i] – Corrin, Hoshidan Unity can't be blocked by more than one creature.
[i]Hoshidan Unity[/i] – If a creature dealing combat damage to a player would cause a triggered ability of a permanent you control to trigger, it triggers an additional time.
[i]Dragon Stone[/i] – {4}{R}{W}: Put two +1/+1 counters on Corrin. He gains flying until end of turn.
